extendedInfo.description: The Americas teaches students about each of the countries in North, South and Central America. The study section presents the student with basic factual, statistical and demographic information about each country.  This section also includes the location on a map as well as the national flag and coat of arms.The flashcards section allows a student to quickly learn the name, location, capital, flag and coat of arms in a flashcard format.The quiz section will then test the students knowledge.COMING SOON!- Caribbean countries/territories- Random QuizThis app contains advertisements

reviews.comment: In quiz mode kept giving wrong answers to capitals. But it\'s a nice looking app & it teaches well.
reviews.author: A Google User
